attributes.action: Get Gordon's Sartorial Grooming in check
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
can those reponsible for the prime minister's sartorial makeup rise to the occassion. i understand he's facing a tumultous challange at present, and still believe he's the best man for the job at present.talk is cheap guys..., at least he's on the job.
so pm's stylists, please see to his shirts.. twice i have seen him on screen this week and both times he's had a one sided shirt collar stray. boris johnson we can tolerate, the prime minister in so, totally unacceptable.
if you're being paid for this responsibility, then kindly see to it.
all hands on deck, please!
consider a hidden collar button restrainer.
prime minister, screw your courage to the sticking place and more grease to your elbows.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
